**Granted Powers:** You cast all abjuration spells at +1 caster level.

**Purification Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Nimbus of Light (Spell)|Nimbus of Light]]****:** Light illuminates you until released as an attack.

**2** **[[Deific Vengeance (Spell)|Deific Vengeance]]****:** Deityâ€™s punishment deals 1d6 damage/2 levels (max 5d6).

**3** **[[Recitation (Spell)|Recitation]]****:** Your allies get bonus on AC, attacks and saves.

**4 Castigate:** Verbal rebuke damages those whose alignment differs from yours.

**5** **[[Dance of the Unicorn (Spell)|Dance of the Unicorn]]****:** Purifying mist washes the air clean of smoke, dust, and poisons.

**6** **[[Fires of Purity (Spell)|Fires of Purity]]****:** Subject bursts into magical flame, becoming a dangerous weapon.

**7 [[Righteous Wrath of the Faithful (Spell)|Righteous Wrath of the Faithful]]:** Your allies gain extra attack, +3 on attack rolls and damage rolls.

**8** **[[Sunburst (Spell)|Sunburst]]****:** Blinds all within 80 ft., deals 6d6 damage.

**9 [[Visage of the Deity, Greater (Spell)|Visage of the Deity, Greater]]:** As *[[Visage of the Deity, Lesser (Spell)|lesser visage of the deity]]*, but you become half-celestial or half-fiendish.
